external_references.description: Shilko, J., et al. (2021, October 7). FIN12: The Prolific Ransomware Intrusion Threat Actor That Has Aggressively Pursued Healthcare Targets. Retrieved June 15, 2023.

description: [Wizard Spider](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0102) has dumped the lsass.exe memory to harvest credentials with the use of open-source tool [LaZagne](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0349).(Citation: Mandiant FIN12 Oct 2021)
